title: HACK3R
description: In a future where the line between reality and fantasy is blurred and the only decent living to be made is as a thief, one young hacker is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime, a legendary program that grants unlimited access to any The Skeleton Key. Will his quest for power lead to an early retirement, or to his whole world crashing down around him? Hunted by the FBI and the Mafia, this hacker must survive in an unpleasant future, and fight for the only thing he has his freedom.
author: Alexander Ferrick
